summary: Adds Malukah's covers of Skyrim's bard songs to the game, such that they will randomly play at certain times and locations.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b]Description:[/b] Malukah's covers always made me think of walking atop snowy mountains and amidst vast tundra and I've been waiting for a mod that added her songs ingame. However no mods have done so in a way I'd like so I made my own - despite possessing no modding ability.

[b]How it works:[/b] The mod adds all five of Malukah's Skyrim covers to the ingame world. The songs are set to play during the day (6:00 - 21:00) because I thought this was most appropriate. Also they'll only play whilst outside i.e. not in buildings, towns, dungeons etc.

[b]Maluklah's work:[/b]
[url=https://itunes.apple.com/gb/artist/malukah/id510947971]iTunes[/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCS613EogLXE0lTsxyC1cWLA]YouTube[/url]
[url=https://twitter.com/malukah]Twitter[/url]
[url=https://www.twitch.tv/malukah]Twitch[/url]

[/size][font=Arial][size=3][b]Current Songs Included in Mod:[/b]Â 
-The Dragonborn Comes
-Age of Oppression
-Age of Aggression
-Tale of Tongues
-Vokul Fen Mah[/size][/font]
author: Legumen
